name: 張文中
objective:
This Robotics and Automation Applications (RAA) course is offered only for limited undergraduate students with programming experience.  RAA focuses on projects in the areas of optical inspection, mobile robots, manipulators, visual servoing, and automation.
機器人與自動化應用(RAA)適合大學生修習，因設備因素修課人數有限，須具備程式能力。課程專題聚焦於光學檢測、移動式機器人、機械手臂、視覺伺服與自動化。
schedule:
1st Week 第1週. Course Introduction 課程介紹
2nd Week 第2週. Project: Image Processing 1 影像處理實驗1
3rd Week 第3週. Project: Image Processing 2 影像處理實驗2
4th Week 第4週. Project: Optical Inspection 光學檢測實驗
5th Week 第5週. Project: Mobile Robot Kinematics 移動式機器人運動學
6th Week 第6週. Project: Mobile Robot Navigation 1 移動式機器人導航實驗1
7th Week 第7週. Project: Mobile Robot Navigation 2 移動式機器人導航實驗2
8th Week 第8週. Project: Manipulator Control Simulation 機械手臂模擬實驗
9th Week 第9週. Project: Manipulator Position Control Programming 1 機械手臂程式控制實驗1
10th Week 第10週. Project: Manipulator Position Control Programming 2 機械手臂程式控制實驗2
11th Week 第11週. Project: Vision-Based Control of PTZ Camera 攝影機之主動控制-攝影機視覺控制專題
12th Week 第12週. Project: Vision-Based Control of Mobile Robots 1 機器人之視覺控制-移動式機器人車載視覺控制專題1
13th Week 第13週. Project: Vision-Based Control of Mobile Robots 2 機器人之視覺控制-移動式機器人車載視覺控制專題2
14th Week 第14週. Final Project 1 期末專題 1
15th Week 第15週. Final Project 2 期末專題 2
16th Week 第16週. Final Project 3 期末專題 3
17th Week 第17週. Final Project 4 期末專題 4
18th Week 第18週. Final Presentation and Demo 期末簡報及展示
scorePolicy: The final grade will be a weighted average of attendance 10%, homeworks 10%, projects 60%, and final project 20%. 學期成績權重比例為出席10%，作業成績 10%，專題成績60%，期末專題20%
materials:
Introduction to Robotics: Mechanics and Control, John J. Craig, Addison-Wesley Publishing Company.
